// the setup function runs once when you press reset or power the board
void setup() {
    pinMode(11, OUTPUT);
    pinMode(13, OUTPUT);
    pinMode(10, OUTPUT);
    pinMode(12, OUTPUT);
}

int count = 0;

// the loop function runs over and over again forever
void loop() {
    digitalWrite(11, (count & 1) ? HIGH : LOW);
    digitalWrite(13, (count & 2) ? HIGH : LOW);
    digitalWrite(10, (count & 4) ? HIGH : LOW);
    digitalWrite(12, (count & 8) ? HIGH : LOW);
    delay(100);
    count++;
}
